Ingest_LDD.name: Hayabusa2 Local Data Dictionary
Ingest_LDD.comment: This is the Hayabusa2 Mission Specific Data Dictionary.

DD_Attribute.name: mission_phase_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that describes the mission phase name.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2014-12-03T04:22:04Z to 2015-03-03T00:00:00Z.

This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2015-03-03T00:00:00Z to 2015-10-01T00:00:00Z. EDVEGA is the acronym of Electric Delta-V Earth Gravity Assist which means accelerating spacecraft (delta-V) using electric propulsion and Earth swing-by.
This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2015-10-01T00:00:00Z to 2015-12-22T14:10:00Z.
This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2015-12-22T14:10:00Z to 2018-06-03T05:59:00Z.
This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2018-06-03T05:59:00Z to 2018-06-27T00:35:00Z.
This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2018-06-27T00:35:00Z to 2019-11-13T01:00:00Z.
This is a name of mission phase that period is from 2019-11-13T01:00:00Z.

DD_Attribute.name: observation_date_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the reference observation time in UTC.

DD_Attribute.name: observation_start_date_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the start of observation time in UTC.

DD_Attribute.name: observation_stop_date_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the stop of observation time in UTC.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_start_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the spacecraft clock start count.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: The format for this value is P/TTTTTTTTTT where: P is a partition number that starts from 1, / is the delimiter between a partition number and ticks, TTTTTTTTTT is a zero-padded 10-digit integer count of clock ticks, and TTTTTTTTTT runs from 0000000001 to 4294967295 that is equal to 2^32 - 1.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_stop_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the spacecraft clock stop count.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: The format for this value is P/TTTTTTTTTT where: P is a partition number that starts from 1, / is the delimiter between a partition number and ticks, TTTTTTTTTT is a zero-padded 10-digit integer count of clock ticks, and TTTTTTTTTT runs from 0000000001 to 4294967295 that is equal to 2^32 - 1.

DD_Attribute.name: naif_instrument_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives NAIF name of the instrument.

DD_Attribute.name: raw_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string giving the file name of the raw data in level 0 that is the source of this file.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_distance_from_spacecraft
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a non-negative real number that gives the distance between center of the spacecraft and center of the Ryugu in kilometres.

DD_Attribute.name: earth_distance_from_spacecraft
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a non-negative real number that gives the distance between center of the spacecraft and center of the Earth in kilometres.

DD_Attribute.name: sun_distance_from_spacecraft
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a non-negative real number that gives the distance between center of the spacecraft and center of the Sun in kilometres.

DD_Attribute.name: sun_distance_from_ryugu
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a non-negative real number that gives the distance between center of the Sun and center of the Ryugu in kilometres.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_x_position
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives spacecraft x-position in kilometres from the Sun in J2000 coordinates. This value is calculated without light time correction nor stellar aberration.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_y_position
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives spacecraft y-position in kilometres from the Sun in J2000 coordinates. This value is calculated without light time correction nor stellar aberration.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_z_position
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives spacecraft z-position in kilometres from the Sun in J2000 coordinates. This value is calculated without light time correction nor stellar aberration.

DD_Attribute.name: sun_direction_spacecraft_x_axis_angle
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives angle of spacecraft's X-axis and Sun direction in degrees.

DD_Attribute.name: sun_direction_spacecraft_y_axis_angle
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives angle of spacecraft's Y-axis and Sun direction in degrees.

DD_Attribute.name: sun_direction_spacecraft_z_axis_angle
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives angle of spacecraft's Z-axis and Sun direction in degrees.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_latitude_at_center
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives latitude of Ryugu at the center of the image in degrees.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_longitude_at_center
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives longitude of Ryugu at the center of the image in degrees.

DD_Attribute.name: distance_to_ryugu_at_center
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives distance to the surface of Ryugu at the center of the image in kilometres.

DD_Attribute.name: spatial_resolution_of_ryugu_at_center
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives spatial resolution of the Ryugu's surface at the center of the image in kilometres.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_latitude_at_lower_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives latitude of Ryugu's surface at the lower-left corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the lower-left vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_longitude_at_lower_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives longitude of Ryugu's surface at the lower-left corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the lower-left vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_latitude_at_lower_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives latitude of Ryugu's surface at the lower-right corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the lower-right vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_longitude_at_lower_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives longitude of Ryugu's surface at the lower-right corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the lower-right vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_latitude_at_upper_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives latitude of Ryugu's surface at the upper-left corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the upper-left vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_longitude_at_upper_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives longitude of Ryugu's surface at the upper-left corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the upper-left vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_latitude_at_upper_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives latitude of Ryugu's surface at the upper-right corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the upper-right vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: ryugu_longitude_at_upper_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives longitude of Ryugu's surface at the upper-right corner pixel of the image in degrees. Note that this value represents value at the center of the pixel, instead of value at the upper-right vertex of the pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: backplane_data_version
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives version of backplane data.

DD_Attribute.name: backplane_spice_kernel_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string the gives a SPICE kernel file name used to calculate the backplanes such as the longitude, latitude, and viewing geometories of Ryugu using a shape model specified by backplane_shape_model_spice_kernel_file_name.

DD_Attribute.name: backplane_shape_model_spice_kernel_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a SPICE DSK file including shape model necessary to create backplane data for photometric correction required to create l2e product.

DD_Attribute.name: backplane_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives backplane file name.

DD_Attribute.name: exposure_duration
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number giving the exposure time of the observation in units of seconds. When the number of sub images is 2 for ONC image, this value is for main image. When the number of sub images is more than 2 for ONC image, this value indicates an exposure time for each image.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the name of the filter that was used during the observation to select or modify the radiation that was transmitted to the detector. The value 'None' indicates that no filter was used.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: This value means the ul-band filter is used.
This value means the wide-band is used.
This value means the v-band is used.
This value means the w-band is used.
This value means the x-band is used.
This value means the Na-band is used.
This value means the p-band is used.
This value means the b-band is used.
This value means the filter for the wavelengths ranged from 8 micrometer to 12 micrometer is used.

DD_Attribute.name: band_center
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain an real number that gives an effective band center of a selected band or camera in micrometers. For ONC, this value is calculated using the system efficiency of a specific camera or band, and this value is used to calculate the sensitivity and effective solar irradiance utilized in creation of l2c and l2d.

DD_Attribute.name: bandwidth
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain an real number that gives an effective band with of a selected band or camera in micrometers. For ONC, this value is calculated using the system efficiency of a specific camera or band, and this value is used to calculate the sensitivity and effective solar irradiance utilized in creation of l2c and l2d.

DD_Attribute.name: number_of_binning
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a positive integer that gives the size of the area used for onboard binning. For example, if this value is 1, no binning was conducted. If this value is 2, the area of 2 x 2 pixels is binned to one pixel.

DD_Attribute.name: horizontal_instantaneous_field_of_view
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives the horizontal instantaneous field of view.

DD_Attribute.name: vertical_instantaneous_field_of_view
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives the vertical instantaneous field of view.

DD_Attribute.name: x_lower_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a positive integer that gives the horizontal position of lower-left corner of the area selected as ROI (region of interest) in the full-size image coordinate system. Note that the origin is (1, 1) and the position in integer means center of the pixel. Possible values are 1, 129, 385, 513, 641, 769, and 897 for ONC image.

DD_Attribute.name: y_lower_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a positive integer that gives vertical-position of the lower-left corner of the area selected as ROI (region of interest) in the full-size image coordinate system. Note that the origin is (1, 1) and the position in integer means center of the pixel. Possible values are 1, 129, 385, 513, 641, 769, and 897 for ONC image.

DD_Attribute.name: x_upper_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a positive integer that gives the horizontal position of upper right corner of the area selected as ROI (region of interest) in the full-size image coordinate system. Note that the origin is (1, 1) and the position in integer means center of the pixel. Possible values are 129, 385, 513, 641, 769, 897, and 1024 for ONC frame image, and 32 for ONC optical black image.

DD_Attribute.name: y_upper_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a positive integer that gives the vertical position of upper right corner of the area selected as ROI (region of interest) in the full-size image coordinate system. Note that the origin is (1, 1) and the position in integer means center of the pixel. Possbile values are 129, 385, 513, 641, 769, 897, 1024 for ONC image.

DD_Attribute.name: image_compression_type
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string identifying the type of image compression on the onboard computer of the spacecraft.

DD_Attribute.name: image_compression_algorithm
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string identifying the algorithm of image compression.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: StarPixel Lossless compression algorithm is used.
StarPixel Flexible compression algorithm is used.

DD_Attribute.name: image_compression_initial_subsampling_interval
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a non-negative integer that gives value of exponent n for initial subsampling interval that is 2**n (see Takada+2007).

DD_Attribute.name: image_compression_quality
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a non-negative real number that gives the value of quality degradation parameter. The value of quality degradation parameter is set by command from the ground in 8 bits, but only upper 4 bits are included in the telemetry. The value of quality parameter should be within the range from 0 to 31.875 (= 0.125*2**8) if value of observation_mode is Science, and from 0 to 15.875 (= 0.125*2**7) if value of observation_mode is Navigation Dump. The value of quality degradation parameter is higher, quality of lossy compressed image will be worse, and the value is lower, the quality will be fine. If value of quality degradation parameter is 0, there will be no quality degradation.

DD_Attribute.name: image_processing_return_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives an image processing error log.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: This value means that invalid arguments have been passed to image processing command which is sent to DE or ONC-E.

This value means that error related to buffer size on image processing occurred, e.g., image sizes of two buffers specified as two operands of image processing command differ, buffer sizes of source and destination buffers differ.
This value means that error on hardware operation occurred, e.g., memory race condition, hardware operation does not finished until prescribed duration (timeout).
This value means that overflow occurred during image processing.
This value means that underflow occurred during image processing.
This value means that both of overflow and underflow occurred during image processing.
This value means that zero division occurred during image processing.
This value means that image processing was interrupted for some reason.

DD_Attribute.name: actual_bitdepth
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a positive integer that gives the actual bit-depth for each pixel. This is corresponding to a dynamic range of the raw (l2a) image for ONC. Although the l2a data is stored in a 16-bit integer image array, the bit depth used for nominal image acquisition is 12. A bit depth is reduced to 10 or 8 bit for some images during digital processing in DE or ONC-E dividing the original data by 2 or 4.

DD_Attribute.name: right_ascension_at_center
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives right ascension of the center of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: declination_at_center
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives declination of the center of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: right_ascension_at_lower_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives right ascension of the lower-left corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: declination_at_lower_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives declination of the lower-left corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: right_ascension_at_lower_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives right ascension of the lower-right corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: declination_at_lower_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives declination of the lower-right corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: right_ascension_at_upper_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives right ascension of the upper-left corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: declination_at_upper_left_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives declination of the upper-left corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: right_ascension_at_upper_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives right ascension of the upper-right corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: declination_at_upper_right_corner
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives declination of the upper-right corner of the image in degrees, in J2000 frame.

DD_Attribute.name: unit_count_value
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a positive real number that gives value corresponding to unit count at original data. This indicates resolution of the value.

DD_Attribute.name: dynamic_range
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a real number that gives a full dynamic range of pixel value at the center of field-of-view, that is 4095 DU - bias, where bias is typically about 300 DU. A dynamic range of pixel value at other place on the detector is less than the value at the center of field-of-view due to vignetting effect. When lineaity correction is not conducted, values between linearity_guaranteed_range and this value are not trustworthy.

DD_Attribute.name: linearity_guaranteed_range
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a positive real number that gives a maximum value of the linearity guaranteed range at the center of field-of-view. This value corresponds to about 3100 counts at the center of field-of-view. A maximum value of the linearity guaranteed range at other place on the detector is less than the value at the center of field-of-view due to vignetting effect. The values less than this value are trustworthy even if the nonlinearity correction is not conducted.

DD_Attribute.name: observation_mode
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the name of the observation mode.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: This value indicates that the image is acquired for science purpose. Such images are basically used to be applied science product procedure (Level 2a and later).
This value indicates that the image is acquired for navigation purpose.

DD_Attribute.name: stray_light_status
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives whether stray light from the backward space of ONC-T exists or not. This value is only applied to ONC-T image. This value is estimated from the values of first_rotation_angle_for_stray_light, second_rotation_angle_for_stray_light, and empirical formula. See Suzuki+2018 and Tatsumi+2019 for the details.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: This image is estimated as affected by stray light from backside of the camera.
This image is estimated as not affected by stray light from backside of the camera.
The stray light could not be estimated because angle information are missing due to some reasons.

DD_Attribute.name: first_rotation_angle_for_stray_light
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a rotation angle around the spacecraft +Y-axis from the reference spacecraft attitude which has the spacecraft +Z-axis is same as the Sun direction vector. This angle is utilized to define the magnitude of the radiator stray light of ONC-T. When second_rotation_angle_for_stray_light is larger than -7 degrees and first_rotation_angle_for_stray_light is smaller than -5 degrees, the radiator stray light of ONC-T exceeds 1 count per second.

DD_Attribute.name: second_rotation_angle_for_stray_light
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives an rotation angle around the spacecraft +Z-axis from the spacecraft attitude after rotation around the spacecraft +Y-axis of first_rotation_angle_for_stray_light from the reference spacecraft attitude which has the spacecraft +Z-axis is same as the Sun direction vector. This angle is utilized to define the magnitude of the radiator stray light of ONC-T. When second_rotation_angle_for_stray_light is larger than -7 degrees and first_rotation_angle_for_stray_light is smaller than -5 degrees, the radiator stray light of ONC-T exceeds 1 count per second.

DD_Attribute.name: number_of_subimage
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain the number of sub images used to create image onboard. For ONC-T image, typical numbers are 1 for a raw image, 2 for a onboard smear reduction image, and more than 2 for onboard stacking image.

DD_Attribute.name: sequence_number
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a non-negative integer that gives a sequence number of a series of sub images.

DD_Attribute.name: spacecraft_clock_count
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a hexadecimal number that gives a spacecraft clock count at the end of image acquisition for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule: The format for this value is P/TTTTTTTTTT where: P is a partition number that starts from 1, / is the delimiter between a partition number and ticks, TTTTTTTTTT is a zero-padded 10-digit integer count of clock ticks, and TTTTTTTTTT runs from 0000000001 to 4294967295 that is equal to 2^32 - 1.

DD_Attribute.name: analog_electronics_mode
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives a mode of ONC-AE, ONC analogue data processing unit.

DD_Attribute.name: digital_electronics_selection
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives which digital electronics, either of ONC-E or DE is selected for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. Basically, DE is selected for digital processing for scientific purpose, whereas ONC-E is selected for optical navigation.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: DE (Digital Electronics) is used for digital data processing.
ONC-E is used for digital data processing.

DD_Attribute.name: t_driving_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives a driving status of ONC-T camera head for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: ONC-T camera head does not drive.

DD_Attribute.name: t_camera_selection_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives a selection status of ONC-T camera head by ONC-AE for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: ONC-AE does not select ONC-T camera head for imaging.
ONC-AE selects ONC-T camera head for imaging.

DD_Attribute.name: t_exposure_duration
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives an exposure time in seconds for ONC-T for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. This value is valid when ONC-T is selected as a valid camera, i.e., value of t_camera_selection_status is 'On'. The list of values is 0, 0.00544, 0.00820, 0.01088, 0.01640, 0.02176, 0.03280, 0.04352, 0.06560, 0.08704, 0.13120, 0.17408, 0.26240, 0.34816, 0.52480, 0.69632, 1.04960, 1.39264, 2.09920, 2.78528, 4.19840, 5.57056, 8.39680, 11.14112, 16.79360, 22.28224, 33.58720, 44.56448, 67.17440, 89.12896, 134.34880, and 178.25792.

DD_Attribute.name: t_filter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of selected filter of ONC-T for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. This value should be neglected when ONC-T is not selected.

DD_Attribute.name: flat_field_lamp_a_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of flat field (FF) lamp A for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. FF lamps are attached in front of ONC-T lens system for calibration.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The lamp A is on, and the voltage mode is low.
The lamp A is on, and the voltage mode is high.

DD_Attribute.name: flat_field_lamp_b_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of flat field (FF) lamp B for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. FF lamps are attached in front of ONC-T lens system for calibration.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The lamp B is on, and the voltage mode is low.
The lamp B is on, and the voltage mode is high.

DD_Attribute.name: w1_driving_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives a driving status of ONC-W1 camera head for n-th image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Attribute.name: w1_camera_selection_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives the selection status of ONC-W1 camera head by ONC-AE for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: ONC-AE does not select ONC-W1 camera head for imaging.
ONC-AE selects ONC-W1 camera head for imaging.

DD_Attribute.name: w1_exposure_duration
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives the exposure time in seconds for ONC-W1 for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. This values is valid when ONC-W1 is selected as a valid camera, i.e., value of w1_camera_selection_status is 'On'. The list is 0, 0.00017000, 0.00025625, 0.00034000, 0.00051250, 0.00068000, 0.00102500, 0.00136, 0.00205, 0.00272, 0.00410, 0.00544, 0.00820, 0.01088, 0.01640, 0.02176, 0.03280, 0.04352, 0.06560, 0.08704, 0.13120, 0.17408, 0.26240, 0.34816, 0.52480, 0.69632, 1.04960, 1.39264, 2.09920, 2.78528, 4.19840, and 5.57056.

DD_Attribute.name: flash_lamp_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives the status of the flash lamp for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. The flash lamp is attached to illuminate target marker for ONC-W1 image. This value is usually set to be "Disable", and is switched to "Enable" for target marker tracking.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Imaging when the flash lamp is off.
Imaging when the flash lamp is on.

DD_Attribute.name: w2_driving_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives the ON/OFF status of ONC-W2 driver for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Attribute.name: w2_camera_selection_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a string that gives the selection status of ONC-W2 by ONC-AE for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: ONC-AE does not select ONC-W2 camera head for imaging.
ONC-AE selects ONC-W2 camera head for imaging.

DD_Attribute.name: w2_exposure_duration
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives the exposure time in seconds for ONC-W2 for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number. This values is valid when ONC-W2 is selected as a valid camera, i.e., value of w2_camera_selection_status is 'On'. The list is 0, 0.00136, 0.00205, 0.00272, 0.00410, 0.00544, 0.00820, 0.01088, 0.01640, 0.02176, 0.03280, 0.04352, 0.06560, 0.08704, 0.13120, 0.17408, 0.26240, 0.34816, 0.52480, 0.69632, 1.04960, 1.39264, 2.09920, 2.78528, 4.19840, 5.57056, 8.39680, 11.14112, 16.79360, 22.28224, 33.58720, and 44.56448.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_timeout_error_count
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain an integer number that gives a filter wheel driver timeout error count in 4 bits for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_null_position_flag
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a filter wheel driver null position flag for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Null point of the filter wheel is not detected.
Null point of the filter wheel is detected.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_position_sensor_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of "filter wheel position sensor" for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_reset_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string to describe whether filter wheel driver is in reset sequence or not for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Filter wheel driver is not in reset sequence.
Filter wheel driver is in reset sequence.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_driving_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the driving status of the ONC-T filter wheel driver for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_number.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_step_counter
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain an integer that gives the step counter of filter wheel driver for n-th sub image, where n is sequence_counter. This value increases every 1/4800 rotation, thus this value becomes 4800 after one filter wheel rotation.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_wheel_driver_step_counter_error_count
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a non-negative integer that gives a error counter of filter wheel driver step counter.

DD_Attribute.name: smear_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of smear correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2b.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Smear correction is applied on the ground processing.
Smear correction is applied on the spacecraft using a 0-second exposure sub-image.

DD_Attribute.name: bias_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of bias correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2b. The bias correction is included in smear correction.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Bias correction is applied on the ground processing.
Bias correction is applied on the spacecraft using a 0-second exposure sub-image.

DD_Attribute.name: dark_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of dark correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2b.

DD_Attribute.name: radiance_conversion_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of conversion to radiance. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2c.

DD_Attribute.name: hardware_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of hardware correction.

DD_Attribute.name: hardware_correction_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a file including necessary parameters related hardware correction.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_c_elec_{yyyy}{mm}{dd}.db
where {yyyy}{mm}{dd} is version of the file, {yyyy} is year in four digits, {mm} is month in zero-padded two digits, and {dd} is day in zero-padded two digits.

DD_Attribute.name: nonlinearity_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of nonlinearity correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2b.

DD_Attribute.name: nonlinearity_correction_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a file including necessary parameters related nonlinearity correction.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_c_linc_{yyyy}{mm}{dd}.db
where {yyyy}{mm}{dd} is version of the file, {yyyy} is year in four digits, {mm} is month in zero-padded two digits, and {dd} is day in zero-padded two digits.

DD_Attribute.name: flat_field_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of flat-field correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2b.

DD_Attribute.name: flat_field_correction_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a file name of flat field that is an independent component with CCD temperature.

DD_Attribute.name: flat_field_correction_parameter_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a file name of flat field parameters.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_dependent_flat_field_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of correction of a CCD temperature dependent component of flat-field. This calibration is only applied to x- and p-filters image of ONC-T.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Correction of a CCD-temperature dependent component of flat-field is not applied.
Correction of a CCD-temperature dependent component of flat-field is applied.

DD_Attribute.name: temperature_dependent_flat_field_correction_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a file name of flatfield that is a dependent component with CCD temperature. This calibration is only applied to x- and p-filters image of ONC-T.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_cal_flatfield_t{band}f_{date}_norm_td.fit
where {band} is for band, and {date} is version of the file. Only x and p for {band} are supported.

DD_Attribute.name: stray_light_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives the status of stray light correction of ONC-T image. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2b of ONC-T image when the stray_light_status is "AFFECTED".

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Stray light correction is not applied.

DD_Attribute.name: stray_light_mean_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a file name of average of stray light pattern image.

DD_Attribute.name: stray_light_first_principal_component_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a file name of first principal component of stray light pattern image.

DD_Attribute.name: stray_light_second_principal_component_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a file name of second principal component of stray light pattern image.

DD_Attribute.name: distortion_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of distortion correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2c.

DD_Attribute.name: distortion_correction_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a file including necessary data for distortion correction required to create l2c.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_c_dist_{yyyy}{mm}{dd}.db
where {yyyy}{mm}{dd} is version of the file, {yyyy} is year in four digits, {mm} is month in zero-padded two digits, and {dd} is day in zero-padded two digits.

DD_Attribute.name: alignment_offset_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of alignment offset correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2c.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Alignment offset correction is not conducted.

DD_Attribute.name: radiometric_calibration_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of radiometric correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2c.

DD_Attribute.name: radiometric_calibration_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a file including necessary data for radiometric correction required to create l2c and parameters required for l2d (I/F) creation.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_c_radc_{yyyy}{mm}{dd}.db
where {yyyy}{mm}{dd} is version of the file, {yyyy} is year in four digits, {mm} is month in zero-padded two digits, and {dd} is day in zero-padded two digits.

DD_Attribute.name: ccd_sensitivity_calibration_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of CCD sensitivity calibration that depends on CCD temperature.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: CCD sensitivity calibration is not applied.

DD_Attribute.name: ccd_sensitivity_calibration_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a file including necessary data for calibration of CCD sensitivity dependence on CCD temperature.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_c_ccdt_{yyyy}{mm}{dd}.db
where {yyyy}{mm}{dd} is version of the file, {yyyy} is year in four digits, {mm} is month in zero-padded two digits, and {dd} is day in zero-padded two digits.

DD_Attribute.name: ccd_sensitivity
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a sensitivity of selected band or camera in (counts/s)/(W/m2/micrometer/str) used to create l2c.

DD_Attribute.name: sensitivity_calibration_period
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a sensitivity calibration period to describe sensitivity variation after two touch down events.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Period before touch down 1, i.e., from 2014-12-03T04:22:04 to 2019-02-21T22:29:13.

DD_Permissible_Value.value: Between Touch Down 1 and Touch Down 2
DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Between Touch Down 1 and Touch Down 2, i.e., from 2019-02-21T22:29:13 to 2019-07-11T01:06:22.

DD_Attribute.name: elapsed_time_for_sensitivity_calibration
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives elapsed time for sensitivity calibration from the start of the calibration period specified by sensitivity_calibration_period, because the sensitivity has time dependence after the second touchdown.

DD_Attribute.name: solar_distance_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of solar distance correction nominally conducted during creation of l2d.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Solar distance correction is not applied.

DD_Attribute.name: solar_distance_for_calibration
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives solar distance used to create l2d. This value is considered to be consistent with value of sun_distance_from_spacecraft.

DD_Attribute.name: effective_solar_irradiance
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a effective solar irradiance calclulated at the solar distance of 1 AU for a selected band or camera in [W/m2/um] .

DD_Attribute.name: photometric_correction_status
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of photometric correction. This value is only valid for the product that is equal to or higher than l2e.

DD_Attribute.name: photometric_correction_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives a name of a file including necessary data for photometric correction required to create l2e.

DD_Value_Domain.formation_rule:
The format for this value is
hyb2_onc_c_phot_{yyyy}{mm}{dd}.db
where {yyyy}{mm}{dd} is version of the file, {yyyy} is year in four digits, {mm} is month in zero-padded two digits, and {dd} is day in zero-padded two digits.

DD_Attribute.name: bus_line_voltage
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a bus line voltage in volts. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: onc_electric_current
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC current value in amperes. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: fla_c_electric_current
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a FLA-C (capacitor bank of flash lamp) current value in amperes. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: onc_analog_electronics_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-AE temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: t_optics_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-T optics temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: t_ccd_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-T CCD temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: t_electric_circuit_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-T electric circuit temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: w1_optics_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-W1 optics temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: w1_ccd_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-W1 CCD temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: w1_electric_circuit_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-W1 electric circuit temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: w2_optics_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-W2 optics temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: w2_ccd_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-W2 CCD temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: w2_electric_circuit_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a ONC-W2 electric circuit temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: fla_c_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives a FLA-C temperature in degrees Celsius. This value is estimated at the time of value of observation_date_time attribute from House keeping data by interpolation.

DD_Attribute.name: reference_frame_filter_axis_number
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a non-negative integer that gives filter axis number of reference frame.

DD_Attribute.name: reference_frame_filter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives filter name of reference frame.

DD_Attribute.name: reference_frame_date_time
DD_Attribute.definition: The value field shall contain a character string that gives the reference observation time of reference frame in UTC.

DD_Attribute.name: filter_axis_number
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a non-negative integer that gives filter axis number for this band.

DD_Attribute.name: band_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives source file name of this band.

DD_Attribute.name: data_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a maximum value of the data of the context.

DD_Attribute.name: data_mininimum
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a minimum value of the data of the context.

DD_Attribute.name: data_mean
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a mean value of the data of the context.

DD_Attribute.name: data_standard_deviation
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a standard deviation value of the data of the context.

DD_Attribute.name: ccd_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a real number that gives assumed CCD temperature for the calibration data.

DD_Attribute.name: normalization
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives whether data is normalized or not. This value shall contain a character string that gives a status of normalization. This normalization is conducted only for flat fields. All pixel values of the flat fields are divided by the average of the pixels in the central area (300 x 300 pixels).

DD_Attribute.name: image_area_trimming
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a character string that gives whether image area of calibration data is trimmed or not for image co-registration.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Data is trimmed for image co-registration.

DD_Attribute.name: tir_image_type
DD_Attribute.definition: Type of TIR image.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Target image after subtraction of shutter image.
Target image before subtraction of shutter image.

DD_Attribute.name: number_of_accumulated_images
DD_Attribute.definition: This value means the scacking frame number of images.

DD_Attribute.name: number_of_bit_shift
DD_Attribute.definition: This value means number of bit shifts applied to the image onboard. The raw image is 12-bit data without bit shift. The stacked images are 16-, 17-, 18-, and 19-bits before bit shift, and are applied bit shift of 1, 2, 3, and 4, respectively, to acquire data with bitdepth of 15-bit.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: One bit shift is applied for 16 frame stacked image.
Two bit shifts are applied for 32 frame stacked image.
Three bit shifts are applied for 64 frame stacked image.
Four bit shifts are applied for 128 frame stacked image.

DD_Attribute.name: peltier_power_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Peltier cooler/heater power status.

DD_Attribute.name: peltier_desired_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Setting of desired temprerature by Peltier temperature controller.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Desired temperature is set to 10 degrees Celsius.
Desired temperature is set to 40 degrees Celsius.

DD_Attribute.name: coarse_grained_temperature_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Coarse-grained temperature status.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Peltier temperature is within +- 10 degrees Celsius to the desired value, peltier_desired_temperature.
Peltier temperature is not within +- 10 degrees Celsius to the desired value, peltier_desired_temperature.

DD_Attribute.name: fine_grained_temperature_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Fine-grained temperature status.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Peltier temperature is within +- 0.1 degrees Celsius to the desired value, peltier_desired_temperature.
Peltier temperature is not within +- 0.1 degrees Celsius to the desired value, peltier_desired_temperature.

DD_Attribute.name: bolometer_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Uncooled micro-bolometer array temperature in the detector package of TIR-S. This is kept at a temperature of peltier_desired_temperature (nominally 40 degrees Celsius) +/- 0.5 degrees Celsius during observation period. This temperature is sampled in the timing of acquiring image.

DD_Attribute.name: package_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Detector package temperature of TIR-S. This is kept at a constant temperature during observation period. This temperature is sampled in the timing of acquiring image.

DD_Attribute.name: case_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Case temperature of TIR-S. This is kept at a constant temperature during observation period. This temperature is sampled in the timing of acquiring image.

DD_Attribute.name: shutter_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Shutter temperature of TIR-S. The shutter as a blackbody calibration target of TIR-S is kept at a constant temperature during observation period. This temperature is sampled in the timing of acquiring image.

DD_Attribute.name: lens_temperature
DD_Attribute.definition: Lens temperature of TIR-S. The lens of TIR-S is kept at a constant temperature during observation period. This temperature is sampled in the timing of acquiring image.

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_lookup_table_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: Lookup table file name for conversion between radiant flux and DN of image.

DD_Attribute.name: detector_gain
DD_Attribute.definition: InAs detector gain (High/Low)

DD_Attribute.name: number_of_stack
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a positive integer that indicates number of stack of data for each spectrum.

DD_Attribute.name: exposure_duration
DD_Attribute.definition: This value shall contain a positive integer that indicates exposure duration.

DD_Attribute.name: sampling_mode
DD_Attribute.definition: Sampling mode (FPGA/C11/C31/C42)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Chopper power status

DD_Attribute.name: heater_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Heater power status

DD_Attribute.name: radiometric_calibration_lamp_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Radiometric calibration lamp power status

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Radiometric calibration lamp is powered on.
Radiometric calibration lamp is powered off.

DD_Attribute.name: wavelength_calibration_lamp_status
DD_Attribute.definition: Wavelength calibration lamp power status

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Wavelength calibration lamp powered is on.
Wavelength calibration lamp powered is off.

DD_Attribute.name: optics_temperature_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of optics temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: optics_temperature_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of optics temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: optics_temperature_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of optics temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: detector_temperature_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of InAs detector temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: detector_temperature_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of InAs detector temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: detector_temperature_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of InAs detector temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: s_base_plate_temperature_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of S base plate temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: s_base_plate_temperature_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of S base plate temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: s_base_plate_temperature_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of S base plate temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: analog_electronics_base_plate_temperature_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of AE base plate temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: analog_electronics_base_plate_temperature_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of AE base plate temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: analog_electronics_base_plate_temperature_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of AE base plate temperature (degC)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_frequency_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of chopper frequency (Hz)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_frequency_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of chopper frequency (Hz)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_frequency_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of chopper frequency (Hz)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_amplitude_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of chopper amplitude

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_amplitude_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of chopper amplitude

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_amplitude_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of chopper amplitude

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_current_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of chopper current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_current_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of chopper current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: chopper_current_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of chopper current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: preamplifier_current_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of preamplifier current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: preamplifier_current_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of preamplifier current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: preamplifier_current_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of preamplifier current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: heater_current_average
DD_Attribute.definition: Average of heater current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: heater_current_maximum
DD_Attribute.definition: Maximum of heater current (mA)

DD_Attribute.name: heater_current_minimum
DD_Attribute.definition: Minimum of heater current (mA)

DD_Class.name: Mission_Information
DD_Class.definition: This class contains information about the Hayabusa2 mission. The attributes in this class are common to all mission data products.

DD_Class.name: Observation_Information
DD_Class.definition: This class contains information about observation. The attributes in this class are common to all mission data products.

DD_Class.name: Observation_Geometry
DD_Class.definition: This class contains information about observation geometry. The attributes in this class are common to all mission data products.

DD_Class.name: Image_Observation_Information
DD_Class.definition: This class contains observation information for image data.

DD_Class.name: ONC_Image_Information
DD_Class.definition: This class contains ONC-specific image observation information.

DD_Class.name: Sub_Image_Information
DD_Class.definition: This class contains ONC sub image parameters.

DD_Class.name: ONC_Image_Processing_Parameters
DD_Class.definition: This class contains ONC-specific image processing parameters

DD_Class.name: ONC_Instrument_Attributes
DD_Class.definition: This class contains ONC instrument-specific parameters.

DD_Class.name: ONC_Multiband_Observation_Information
DD_Class.definition: This class contains ONC Multiband observation information for co-registered image data.

DD_Class.name: ONC_Band_Information
DD_Class.definition: Each band Information for co-registered data.

DD_Class.name: ONC_Calibration_Data_Information
DD_Class.definition: Calibration data information for ONC image
